talents.Anti-Air Master: ATK +50% when the target is an aerial unit

Plume.trait: Obtain 1 DP after this unit defeats an enemy; Refunds the original DP Cost when retreated

talents.Smoke Installation: Heals an ally and then provides 20% Physical Dodge for 3 seconds

talents.Targeting - Primary: Has a 20% chance to increase the ATK of the current attack to 150% when attacking

talents.Quick Skill Usage: Immediately obtains 30 Skill Points after deployment

talents.Additional Healing: Has a 15% chance to heal 1 extra ally

talents.Armor Break: ATK +6%; Attacks enemies with the highest DEF first

Orchid.trait: Deals Arts Damage and Slows the target for a short time

talents.Black Mist: Attacks reduce the target's RES by 20% for 1 second

talents.Divination: Obtains one of the following buffs permanently when deployed: ATK +13%, ASPD +13, or Max HP +20%

talents.Electrostatic Field: Reduces the target's movement speed for 0.6 seconds when attacking

talents.Anti-Air Specialist: ATK +35% when the target is an aerial unit

talents.Heavy Shuriken: Attack Interval increases slightly, but ATK +20%

talents.Karlan Patrol: DEF +16% when two or more enemies are blocked

talents.Lone Wolf: ATK and DEF +11% when there are no allies in the four adjacent grids

talents.Fierce Stabbing: Has a 10% chance to increase the ATK of the current attack by 100% when attacking. The chance increases to 30% when Vigna uses her skill

talents.Covered Strike: Range expands, but Attack Interval increases slightly

talents.Self-Healing: Restores HP by 12% of Max HP when there is an enemy killed within the 8 surrounding grids

talents.Combo: Has a 20% chance to attack twice in a row when attacking

talents.Support of the Little: Cost -1; The DEF of all allies with DP Cost lower than 10 increases by 6%

Can Shift enemies by using skills
Can be deployed on Ranged Grids

talents.Quick Fists: Has a 30% chance to Dodge the enemy's Physical Melee Attack. ATK +100% in the next attack if the Dodge is successful

talents.Blast Attachment Refit: Has a 30% chance to increase the ATK of the current attack by 60% when using Normal Attacks and skills

talents.Emotional Absorption: Restores 2 extra Skill Points when attacking an enemy and 8 extra Skill Points when killing an enemy

talents.Arts Sniper: Increases the Arts Damage taken by all blocked enemies by 15% when deployed
